title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 125.7 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 125.7 - Exceptions

State Regulations

The commissioner or deputy commissioner and counsel, the
director of the division of hearing and adjudication or a supervising
administrative law judge, may permit deviations from the provisions of this

Subchapter where they are satisfied that the specific circumstances involved in
any situation would result in a subversion of the intent of article 2-A of the

Vehicle and Traffic Law if this Subchapter were to be strictly
applied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
125.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
